name: Zephaniah Marion
coverLetter:
ZEPHANIAH W. MARION
431 N. Wilson Ave #5
Pasadena, CA 91106
Zmarion@yahoo.com
213.804.8444
www.facebook.com/ZephaniahMarion
EDUCATION
Wallenpaupack High School, Pennsylvania, 2007. NPK University, Online Gardening University 2015-2017.
 
OBJECTIVE
To grow as well as cultivate dynamic strains utilizing my experience in cultivating/extracting/manufacturing to reach and expand your consumer base.
 
SKILLS
GROWING: Advanced organic soil cultivator and cannabis strain creator:
• Cannabis hybrid creator and cloner.
• Seedling, Vegetation, and Flower cultivator.
• Drying, Curing, and Trimming Specialist.
• Soil Mycelium Specialist.
• Topping
• Caging
• Pruning
• Indoor Lighting knowledge
EXTRACTION: Advanced Cannabis Extraction knowledge:
• Everclear RSO Oil Extraction.
• Dry Ice Kief Extraction and Press.
• Ice Water Bubble Hash/Kief and Press.
• Butane Dabs
• Heat Rosin Extraction
• Cannabis Edibles: Canna-Butter, RSO Black/Coconut Oil, Canna-milk, Canna-Flour, Canna- Chocolate-Canna Juice.  
 
OTHER: Bobcat, Skid Steer, Wheel Loader, Scissor Lift, Box Truck, and Auto Driver. Stone Thermalist/Stone Cutting Specialist, Lifeguard-CPR and Defibulator Certified (2002-2004), Traveling CXO. House Flipping Business Owner
 
 
     PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
 
Cannabis Grow Specialist/Extractor: Owner/ Producer. 2010- Present.
*Specialties: Outdoor Caging and Indoor Scrog Cultivation. Soil Mycelium Specialist.
 
House Flipper/Owner: Marion Investments. 2012-2014. Locate housing properties for potential investment opportunities, Legal and realtor inspections, employee hires. Painting, plumbing, and construction.
 
Exterminator: A3 Superior Pest Control, Pennsylvania. 2010-2012. Served three states NY, NJ, PA for pest control. Responsible for driving, loading 200-pound heaters and cables into customers homes. Implementation of process from start to finish.
 
Laborer: Home Depot, Maine. 2009. Responsible for tearing down and rebuilding in store garden structures (50ftx20ft) and driving the scissor lift on location.
 
Resident Technician: St. Joseph’s Center, Scranton, PA. 2009-2011. Responsible for patient care. Duties included: Feeding, G-Tube Feedings, O2 tanks, rehabilitation.
 
Sports Palace Attendant: Ceaser’s Cove Haven, Lake Ariel, PA. 2004-2009. Responsible for maintenance of tennis, bocce, ice-skating, and pool hall areas. Grass cutting, leaf blowing, pool cleaning, house keeping, and heavy lifting of materials as needed. Snowmobile and waterski instructor.
